title: Jupiter Transit in the 4th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Jupiter transits the 4th house for Scorpio Ascendant, growth focuses on emotional security, home, family support, and inner stability. This phase improves peace of mind, strengthens family bonds, and supports property or education-related matters. Guidance from elders proves beneficial, and domestic decisions are made with wisdom. However, excess comfort-seeking or complacency can slow progress. When balanced, this transit nurtures inner contentment, stable foundations, and long-term domestic well-being.

sections.title: Home & Domestic Life
points: Overindulgence in comfort should be avoided

closing: This Jupiter transit strengthens Scorpio Ascendantâ€™s inner and domestic foundations. Growth is sustained when comfort is balanced with purpose.
